thread.title: SOMERS/LUANNE YVONNE
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by SOMERS/LUANNE YVONNE

author: SOMERS/LUANNE YVONNE
title: SOMERS/LUANNE YVONNE
text: In the past I always searched for my own ticket. It was grueling! Last time I needed a ticket I used ASAP. As soon as I input my info I received a call from Tyra who followed me through me hesitations and changes until she found exactly what I needed. Not trusting the process, I still checked in the background to make sure I got the best price. I now trust Tyra now with all of my trip planning. I just booked another flight and am extremely happy that I didn't have to stress out and could let her do the leg work for me. I will be recommending ASAP to all of my friends.
